text: amazing dizi, the only one in Toronto and GTA. family friendly. very good service. very clean. i have no compliants about this place. i would definitely recommend it and go there again.
Koobideh was made just right, perfectly baked fresh bread and awesome yogurt in a calm traditional Persian setting.  What else can you ask for?
This place is very unorganized and is not set up properly. Disappointing. The food took over one hour and it was only ok and the service was terrible. They need to step up if they want to survive.
